summary: Includes several new eye colors for every race, including glowing eyes.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/12307-1-1331077863.jpg[/img]

[b][Requires Dawnguard Expansion][/b]

Includes the following new (high-res) eye colors for all races:

Aquamarine
Argent
Auburn
Blue
Brown
Crimson
Dark Green
Dark Red
Dark Violet
Dodger Blue
Gold
Green
Olive
Orange
Red
Sky Blue
Slate Blue
Violet
Violet-Red
Yellow

Khajiit eyes come in two variations, and Argonian eyes come in three.
Each eye also has two different versions for all races, normal and glowing.
The glowing version of every eye also comes vampire-enabled!


================================
[b]FAQ[/b]
================================

[b]Q:[/b] Why does my Vampire suddenly have normal eyes?!
[b]A:[/b] In order to fix a problem where Vampires would never save new eye changes, I had to modify how vampires work slightly. Have no fear, if you prefer Bethesda\'s default vampire eyes, you can manually change them back to such with a couple of console commands or with another mod of mine. 
(See Below)

[b]Q:[/b] How do I change my eyes? I want to use these but I already made a character!
[b]A:[/b] Need an easy way to change your eyes you say? Then try out my new spell mod, [i]Transfiguration:[/i] 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22039


================================
[b]Change Log[/b]
================================

[b]Version 1.0[/b]
Initial Release

[b]Version 1.1[/b]
Added Argonian Eyes (Three Variations Available)
Added Khajiit Eyes (Two Variations Available)

[b]Version 1.2[/b]
Implemented Dawnguard Support.
Fixed an issue where Vampire Eye changes wouldn\'t save.
author: Krisan Thyme

files.name: Spectral Shades - Eyes
